Bash(for lang in de es ar hi id it ja nl pl pt th tr vi zh)

Bash(do python3 -c "
import json

file_path = ''frontend/public/locales/$lang.json''

with open(file_path, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    data = json.load(f)

if ''legal'' not in data:
    data[''legal''] = {}

data[''legal''][''privacyPolicy''] = ''Privacy Policy''
data[''legal''][''privacyPolicyDesc''] = ''How we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Includes data retention periods and your GDPR rights.''
data[''legal''][''readPrivacyPolicy''] = ''Read Privacy Policy''
data[''legal''][''termsOfService''] = ''Terms of Service''
data[''legal''][''termsOfServiceDesc''] = ''Our service agreement including acceptable use, fees, your data rights, and what happens when you delete your account.''
data[''legal''][''readTermsOfService''] = ''Read Terms of Service''
data[''legal''][''lastUpdated''] = ''Last updated''

with open(file_path, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    json.dump(data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

print(''Updated $lang.json'')
")
